name: Happy Rabbit Farm
description:
Happy Rabbit Farm is a short horror game developed in Rpg maker MV.

A little girl named Alice lost her best friend.  You need to find Sebastian and help Alice to defeat monsters.

Controls: WASD or mouse click

WARNING: The game contains questionable content

I wish you luck and enjoyable game!

Made for 16th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam

PS. We recommend downloading the game.
